Folder to start program in
Command-line arguments to program to launch
True to wait until program finishes before returning from LaunchProgram, False to return immediately while program continues to run

member.name: M:MapWinUtility.DataManagement.CheckFile2Newest(System.String,System.String,System.Single)
member.summary: Chris Michaelis July 2 2005 Used to compare write times between the first and second file. Returns true if File2 is newer than File1

member.name: M:MapWinUtility.Net.GetWebResponse(System.String,System.Net.WebHeaderCollection,System.Int32)
member.summary: Make a System.Net.WebRequest and return its response
member.param: URL to retrieve
Optional headers for web request
Milliseconds to wait for a response before deciding it has failed
member.returns: WebResponse that comes from the requested URL
member.remarks: If a proxy server is needed, prompt for it then proceed

member.name: M:MapWinUtility.Net.SetRequestProxy(System.Net.WebRequest)
member.summary: Private routine for using locally cached proxy server information
member.param: Set the proxy server of this request

member.name: M:MapWinUtility.Net.ProxyFromString(System.String)
member.summary: Private function for parsing proxy server information from a string
member.param: Proxy information formatted as: servername:port or for servers requiring authentication: servername:port:username:password
member.returns: True if proxy server information was parsed from string into m_WebProxy False if proxy server information could not be parsed from aProxyString
member.remarks: port must be numeric, 80 and 8080 are popular ports

member.name: M:MapWinUtility.Net.WebExceptionSetProxy(System.Net.WebException)
member.summary: Private routine to handle a WebException that is a result of needing proxy information
member.param: WebException that may be the result of needing proxy information
member.returns: True if proxy information was found. True implies that another attempt at the same action which produced the given exception may succeed. False means one of the following: a) the exception was not (407) Proxy Authentication Required b) proxy information was not found c) too many tries have been made to get proxy information
member.remarks: The first time this is called, it checks the registry for saved proxy information. If no information is found in the registry, or another proxy exception occurs, the user is prompted for proxy information which is then saved in the registry.

member.name: M:MapWinUtility.Net.ExecuteUrl(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Int32)
member.summary: Send an HTTP POST to a URL and return the results as a string
member.param: URL to access
data to sent in POST
True to allow redirection from fullUrl
fail after not getting a response for this many milliseconds
member.returns: response from web server as a string

member.name: M:MapWinUtility.Net.DownloadFile(System.String)
member.summary: Download from a URL to a string
member.param: URL to request
member.returns: Response from URL as string

member.name: M:MapWinUtility.Net.CheckInternetConnection(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Check for an internet connection by attempting to get a response from CheckAgainstURL
member.param: URL to access
Fail after not getting a response for this many milliseconds
member.returns: True if a response was received from CheckAgainstURL, False if there was an error or timeout

member.name: F:MapWinUtility.Scripting.ByteOrderMarker
member.summary: Unicode prefix sometimes gets included in a string, we have to remove it before interpreting as a filename or script

member.name: M:MapWinUtility.Scripting.PrepareScript(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String@,System.String)
member.returns: an assembly built by compiling aCode or the contents of the file referenced by aCode
member.remarks: Broke out the run method into PrepareScript and Run. No longer have to pass in a reference to the Mainform. Output assembly can be loaded by the appropriate Plugin manager from the calling code.

member.name: M:MapWinUtility.MiscUtils.ParseDouble(System.String,System.Double)
member.summary: Parses double value from string. Uses invariant culture first (. separator). On failure replces '.' to ',' and tries again.
member.param: A string to parse value from
Default value to return if parsing has faield
member.returns: True on success, false otherwise

member.name: M:MapWinUtility.IProgressStatus.Progress(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Log the progress of a long-running task
member.param: Current position/item of task
Final position/item of task
member.remarks: A final call when the task is done with aCurrent = aLast indicates completion and should clear the progress display.

member.name: M:MapWinUtility.IProgressStatus.Status(System.String)
member.summary: Update the current status message
member.param: Description of current processing status

member.name: T:MapWinUtility.IProgressStatus
member.summary: Interface for handling status and progress updates

member.name: P:MapWinUtility.IProgressStatusCancel.Canceled
member.summary: True if user has requested to abort the activity monitored by Progress
member.remarks: Automatically resets to False after returning True

member.name: T:MapWinUtility.IProgressStatusCancel
member.summary: Interface that can also be implemented when implementing IProgressStatus if also providing the option to cancel a long-running action

member.name: T:MapWinUtility.NullProgressStatus
member.summary: Default implementation does nothing

member.name: M:MapWinUtility.ProgressLevel.#ctor(System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Create a new level in the stack of logger progress levels
member.param: True to increment progress by one at level above new level after finishing, Default = False
True to keep new level at the same level we are already on rather than adding to the stack
member.remarks: Recommendation: Using myLevel as new ProgressLevel()...[call other code that contains progress]...End Using

member.name: M:MapWinUtility.ProgressLevel.Reset
member.summary: Reset the progress without destroying this level and creating a new one

member.name: M:MapWinUtility.ProgressLevel.Dispose
member.summary: Ensure the stack of logger progress levels is consistent after we are finished with this level

member.name: F:MapWinUtility.MonitorProgressStatus.InnerProgressStatus
member.summary: Another IProgressStatus which will also get a copy of Status and Progress messages
member.remarks: This lets us send Progress and Status to MapWindow's status bar while also sending to StatusMonitor.exe

member.name: P:MapWinUtility.MonitorProgressStatus.Canceled
member.summary: True if user has requested to cancel current operation Automatically cleared after level 1 progress hears that it is True

member.name: P:MapWinUtility.MonitorProgressStatus.Paused
member.summary: True while user has requested a pause in execution
member.returns: True when paused, False when not paused
member.remarks: A button in StatusMonitor.exe labeled "Pause" sends a message "P" through MonitorMessageHandler. The button then changes label to "Run" and if pressed sends a message "R", which changes Paused back to False. Pausing is enforced by the While Paused loop in Sub Progress

member.name: M:MapWinUtility.MonitorProgressStatus.StartMonitor(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Start status monitor as a separate executable
member.param: Full path to status monitor program
Directory to start running in, probably no need to specify this
Arguments to status monitor. If not specified, current process ID is used as only argument
member.returns: True if started or decided to use already running monitor, False if failed to start
member.remarks: pMonitorProcess is set if monitor is successfully started

member.name: M:MapWinUtility.MonitorProgressStatus.StopMonitor
member.summary: Stop StatusMonitor which was started by StartMonitor

member.name: M:MapWinUtility.MonitorProgressStatus.MonitorMessageHandler(System.Object,System.Diagnostics.DataReceivedEventArgs)
member.summary: Messages from standard output of StatusMonitor.exe are handled
member.remarks: All messages are logged, "P" pauses, "R" resumes, "C" cancels

member.name: T:MapWinUtility.MonitorProgressStatus
member.summary: Use StatusMonitor.exe to display Status and Progress and allow user to cancel long-running actions

member.name: F:MapWinUtility.Logger.AutoFlush
member.summary: True to flush after each write to log file False to buffer writes to log file and wait for explicit Flush() or operating system
member.remarks: False may save some time, True makes log files more likely to be helpful

member.summary: Icon to be used on custom message boxes

member.summary: Start logging to a file
member.param: Name of file to put subsequent log messages in
True to append to existing file, False to create new file
True to rename old log files as needed to use aLogFileName, False to overwrite existing log file
True to change log file even if already logging to a file
member.remarks: If aLogFileName is blank and aForceNameChange = True, logging to file is stopped.

member.summary: True to start time stamps at zero when execution starts, stamp elapsed hh:mm:ss.milliseconds, False to stamp each event with current date/time YYYY-MM-DD@hh:mm:ss.milliseconds

member.name: M:MapWinUtility.Logger.Status(System.String)
member.summary: Display the current status in the status bar
member.param: Status message

member.name: M:MapWinUtility.Logger.Status(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Display the current status in the status bar
member.param: Status message
Write to log file flag

member.name: M:MapWinUtility.Logger.Progress(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Log the progress of a long-running task
member.param: Current position/item of task
Final position/item of task
member.remarks: A final call when the task is done with aCurrent = aLast is desirable to clear the progress display. If aLast = 100, then aCurrent is percent progress, but the caller should not convert aCurrent into percent if aLast is not 100.

member.name: M:MapWinUtility.Logger.Progress(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Combination of Status(aMessage) and Progress(aCurrent, aLast)
member.param: Status message
Current position/item of task
Final position/item of task
member.remarks: It is preferred to use Status or Progress(aCurrent, aLast) if only the functionality of one of them is desired.

member.name: P:MapWinUtility.Logger.ProgressRefresh
member.summary: Time in milliseconds that must elapse before a new progress update is passed to ProgressStatus
member.remarks: A delay is desirable for tasks that make progress quickly because the time to update displayed progress can become significant. Default is 200 milliseconds so progress display is refreshed at most 5 times per second. Set to zero to disable this feature.

member.name: M:MapWinUtility.Logger.MethodCallingLogger
member.summary: Walks up the stack to find the method that called into this class
member.returns: file name (if available) and method name of the method that called into this class
member.remarks: stack is not available if not compiled in debug mode, so an empty string is returned

member.name: T:MapWinUtility.Logger
member.summary:
Logger provides program logging to a file and progress messages. All methods and variables are shared, so there is no need to create or pass an instance of Logger. Just make a reference to this library and use Logger.Dbg, Logger.Msg, Logger.Status, Logger.Progress
If a clsProgressStatus is set, then progress and status messages are sent to it, allowing display.

member.name: M:MapWinUtility.Strings.StrSplit(System.String@,System.String@,System.String@)
member.summary: Divides string into 2 portions at position of 1st occurence of specified delimeter. Quote specifies a particular string that is exempt from the delimeter search.
member.param: String to be analyzed
Single-character string delimeter
Multi-character string exempted from search
member.returns: Returns leading portion of incoming string up to first occurence of delimeter. Returns input parameter without that portion. If no delimiter in string, returns whole string, and input parameter reduced to null string.
member.remarks: Example: StrSplit("Julie, Todd, Jane, and Ray", ",", "") = "Julie", and "Todd, Jane, and Ray" is returned as Source. Example: StrSplit("'Julie, Todd', Jane, and Ray", ",", "'") = "Julie, Todd", and "Jane, and Ray" is returned as Source.

member.name: M:MapWinUtility.Strings.WholeFileString(System.String@,System.Int32)
member.summary: Converts specified text file to a string.
member.param: Name of text file to read
Keep trying for this much time
member.returns: Contents of specified text file as string.

member.name: M:MapWinUtility.Strings.IsEmpty(System.String)
member.summary: See if a String is empty or Nothing
member.param: String to check
member.returns: True is empty or Nothing, otherwise False

member.name: M:MapWinUtility.Strings.SaveFileString(System.String@,System.String@)
member.summary: Saves incoming string to a text file.
member.param: Name of output text file
Incoming string to be saved to file

member.name: M:MapWinUtility.modFile.FileExists(System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Tests for existence of a specified file or directory
member.param: file or directory name to check for
True to look for a directory matching PathName
True to look for a file matching PathName
member.returns: True if the specified file or directory exists, False if it does not
member.remarks: AcceptDirectories and AcceptFiles can both be true to check for a file or directory at the same time.

member.name: M:MapWinUtility.modFile.FilenameNoExt(System.String)
member.summary: Converts full path, filename, and extension to only path and filename without extension
member.param: Complete file name
member.returns: path and file name without extension
member.remarks: Example: FilenameNoExt ("C:\foo\bar.txt") = "C:\foo\bar"

member.name: M:MapWinUtility.modFile.FilesMatch(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Compare two files and return True if contents are identical.
member.param: Name of first file to compare
Name of second file to compare
member.returns: true if files are identical, false if not
member.remarks: An exception will occur if either file cannot be read.

member.name: M:MapWinUtility.modFile.FilesMatchText(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Compare two files and return True if contents are identical.
member.param: Name of first file to compare
Name of second file to compare
Ignore case flag
member.returns: true if files are identical, false if not
member.remarks: An exception will occur if either file cannot be read.

member.name: M:MapWinUtility.modFile.MkDirPath(System.String)
member.summary: Create the specified directory and any above it that are not yet there.
member.param: new directory to create
member.remarks: Example: MkDirPath("C:\foo\bar") creates the "C:\foo" and "C:\foo\bar" directories if they do not already exist.

member.name: M:MapWinUtility.modFile.PathNameOnly(System.String@)
member.summary: Reduces full path, filename, and extension to only path
member.param: path and file name
member.returns: path portion of aFilename
member.remarks: Example: PathNameOnly ("C:\foo\bar.txt") = "C:\foo"

member.name: M:MapWinUtility.modFile.TryDelete(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Try to delete a file or directory. If it cannot not be deleted, log a message instead of throwing an exception
member.param: Full path of file or directory to be deleted
member.returns: True if aPath was deleted without error or did not exist False if there was an exception while trying to delete
member.remarks: If aPath is a directory, all the contents are deleted too. Helpful for non-critical cleanup of temporary files that may be locked

member.name: M:MapWinUtility.modFile.TryCopy(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Try copying file from aFromPath to aToPath If it cannot not be copied, log a message instead of throwing an exception
member.param: Path of existing file
Location for new copy of file
member.returns: True if file was copied, False if file did not exist or could not be copied
